name: uTubers.idle
description:
Are you ready to be number one tuber ? Let's take a video and edit it. Add various features into scenes when editing video.
Upload the video and read the comments. You should take a lot of videos to gain more money.
Increase your subscribers and viewers, buy new home, computer and games. Don't forget sleeping and eating something.
If you don't take a video for a long time , your subscriber count decreases.

Features :
- Free to play. Play it anywhere, anytime.
- Outstanding graphics.
- Easy to play, contains offline progress system.
